_sText:
ZM_ARCTIC_V1
The map is based on another map
from hl2 beta. Made from scratch.

ORIGINAL - FURUDE

=====================================
FEATURES:

- Add Weather version
- Add Evening version
- Add Day version
- Add Night version

About:
- Weather version have snowfall and
dark gamma.
- Night version have two tracks on 
worked radio.

- Add Working transport (Truck)
- Add Working light switches
- Add Dynamic skybox
- Add Grass Displacement
- Some windows have 
breakable/unbreakable grid

TECHNICAL INFO:
Player side: 40
Navmesh: yes
=====================================
na hleb: https://www.donationalerts.com/r/furu2desu
